## Description
Plant milk produced by soaking dry Soybean and sesame seeds and grinding them with water.

## Characteristics

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Edible:|true|
|Type:|Derived|
|Form:|Liquid|

- [Make Sesame Milk from Soymilk](/docs/definitions/food/make-sesame-milk-from-soymilk)
